actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Gallatin and Beaverhead National Forests, Montana, as the Spanish Peaks Wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Gallatin and Beaverhead National Forest in the State of Montana as Wilderness. Allows for the correction of clerical and typographical errors in the legal description of the boundaries of such lands.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Gallatin and Beaverhead National Forests, Montana, as the Spanish Peaks Wilderness.
